content: slip stitches you just did sew wings on to either side of anemo slime i left the tail long enough on the wings to embroider the spirals between the head and the wings tiny horns - make two and work in rounds magic_ring 4 single_crochet all increase single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 4 increase single_crochet 5 increase single_crochet 6 single_crochet 5 decrease single_crochet 2 tie off and leave long tail for sewing copyright 2025 all images and pattern belong to crochet impact and its artists feel free to make give and sell items from this pattern but do not distribute this pattern as your own follow me on social media @crochetimpact on tiktok x instagram copyright 2025 all images and pattern belong to crochet impact and its artists feel free to make give and sell items from this pattern but do not distribute this pattern as your own
